PHRASE.LANG: This cursed dagger siphons the lifeblood of its victims into the unholy demon's eye fixed in its blade. You can find this item in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Cette dague maudite aspire la vitalité de ses victimes dans l’œil de l'infâme démon enfermé dans sa lame. Vous pouvez trouver cet objet dans le Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Dieses verfluchte Messer saugt seinen Opfern das Leben aus und leitet es das Auge des unheiligen Dämons in der Klinge. [#Legal]

Questo pugnale maledetto risucchia la linfa vitale delle sue vittime e la racchiude nell'occhio di demone incastonato nella lama. Troverai quest'oggetto nel Giftinator 9000 di Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Esta daga maldita arrastra el alma de sus víctimas hacia el impío ojo demoníaco que habita en su filo. Puedes encontrar este objeto en el Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
This cursed dagger siphons the lifeblood of its victims into the unholy demon's eye fixed in its blade. You can find this item in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
This cursed dagger siphons the lifeblood of its victims into the unholy demon's eye fixed in its blade. You can find this item in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Note to Hellfire: add "You can find this item in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games" to the end of the description. [#Legal]
